Patient 30: Patient 30 is a 45-year-old male with a history of opioid use disorder and chronic back pain. He is currently on buprenorphine-naloxone for opioid dependence and uses acetaminophen for pain management. His past medical history includes a previous prescription of oxycodone, which was discontinued due to dependency issues. There is no documented family history of substance use disorders, and he has no known allergies. His medication regimen has been stable for the past six months.
